entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @Mike_Pence @WhiteHouse Didn’t you say that you wanted states to open early, against the @CDCgov advice? Well, COVID-19 patients have filled hospitals to capacity in Florida, Texas, & Arizona. Now, you want schools to open without following CDC guidelines. You don’t care whether Americans live or die.
